* Our university carries out about 1,000 R&D agreements anually, 75% of which comissioned by industry.
** The UNIVERSEH consortium was established in 2020 by 5 European universities, i.e. the AGH University, Université de Toulouse (France), Heinrich-Heine-Universität Düsseldorf (Germany), Luleå University of Technology (Sweden), and University of Luxembourg (Luxembourg). In 2023, two more universities joined the consortium, namely the 
University of Rome "Tor Vergata" (Italy) and the University of Namur (Belgium).
*** Our university boasts three supercomputers: Ares, Athena, and Prometheus. In 2022, they performed over 6 million tasks with a total calculation time of over 420 million computing hours, which is over 48,716 years.
 **** as of 2022
